0.content: 404 Page not found :( The requested page could not be found.

2.title: Buttons
2.content: Buttons Basic markup Button modifiers Other modifiers Usage Brand colours Deactivated Button groupsBasic markupDefaultThe button style can be used on &lt;a&gt; and &lt;button&gt; tags&lt;a href="#" class="btn btn-default"&gt;Default&lt;/a&gt;&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-default"&gt;Default&lt;/button&gt;Button modifiers Style Class Default .btn-default Primary .btn-primary Warning .btn-warning Danger .btn-danger Options .btn-options Transparent .btn-transparent Link .btn-link To render a full colour button, you can add the .plein class.fr :: Il est aussi possible d’ajouter la classe .plein afin d’avoir des boutons qui ressemblent à ceci: Default Primary Warning Danger Options Transparent Link Other modifiers.no-background: Remove background color of a button. (&lt;button&gt; only)default + no background.txt-blanc: Force text color to white. (&lt;button&gt; only)default + no background.md-padding, .lg-padding: Add more horizontal padding md-padding lg-padding.btn-lg,.btn-xl: Change button sizeLarge button XL ButtonUsageGround rules in choosing the type of button to use.The default style for buttons is outlined. It renders as a white button with a solid 2 pixel wide border.DefaultThere should not be multiple buttons of different (brand) colours on a given screen (or at lease on a section of a page). One of the brand colour should be chosen as accent and used in combination with de default grey button.When a choice is presented to the user, a full-colour button can be used on the button that represent the action suggested by the system.Do this or notIn the same way, we can use a button to reduce the importance of one of the option.Do this or notThe colour of a button using the brand color does not carry any meaning.The full colour version of the buttons are generally use as primary CTA. Good practice dictates that there should only be one CTA per page.Brand coloursBrand colour variants:&lt;a href="#" class="btn btn-jaune"&gt;jaune&lt;/a&gt; Style Class Jaune .btn-jaune Rose .btn-rose Violet .btn-violet Turquoise .btn-turquoise Vert .btn-vert Rouge .btn-rouge Bleu .btn-bleu Orange .btn-orange &lt;a href="#" class="btn btn-jaune plein"&gt;jaune plein&lt;/a&gt; Jaune Rose Violet Turquoise Vert Rouge Bleu Orange DeactivatedWIP&lt;a href="#" class="btn btn-jaune plein btn-inactive"&gt;jaune plein&lt;/a&gt; Jaune Rose Violet Turquoise Vert Rouge Bleu OrangeButton groupsWrap &lt;button&gt; tags into a &lt;div class="btn-group"&gt; to make toggle button groups. The colour is set on each button using the same scheme as for individual buttons toujours quelque fois jamais &lt;div class="btn-group"&gt; &lt;button class="btn btn-default"&gt;toujours&lt;/button&gt; &lt;button class="btn btn-default"&gt;quelque fois&lt;/button&gt; &lt;button class="btn btn-default"&gt;jamais&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

3.title: Callout
3.content: CalloutWIPfr :: Encadré de texte avec fond de couleur. Peu importe le niveau de header (h1-h6) le titre et le corp du texte seront toujours de la même taille. Pas de largeur fixe.3 tailles disponibles: medium est le default, .small et .largeCouleur de background: light grey (default) .beige, .gris &amp; .blanc. 2018 School Year - Province of Québec If the institution you work in is part of a public school board in the province of Québec, you probably have access to a subscription to CAMPUS. Check here&lt;div class="m-callout small beige"&gt; [...]&lt;/div&gt; end

4.title: Cards & vignettes
4.content: Cards &amp; vignettesWIPPlease see working versions on nfb.ca (authorization requierd) Vignettes Types Film for sale Modifiers Horizontal Formats Playlist User’s medias / Complex vignettes Vignettes Vignette gratuite avec un texte de titre vraiment beaucoup trop long pour tester qu'il est bien tronqué campus Claude Cloutier 2010 | 5 min &lt;div class="m-carousel-thumbnails"&gt;&lt;div class="vignetteGratuite vignette"&gt; &lt;a href="#" class="containerScreenshot"&gt; &lt;img src="cover.jpg" class="img-responsive" alt="..."&gt; &lt;/a&gt; &lt;div class="bottomThumbnail"&gt; &lt;!-- Object Title --&gt; &lt;a href="#" class="titre"&gt;Object Title&lt;/a&gt; &lt;!-- Object Status / Type --&gt; &lt;span class="filmRestriction"&gt; &lt;i class="icon-cash-o"&gt;&lt;/i&gt; &lt;span class="campus-label"&gt;label&lt;/span&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;!-- Object Details --&gt; &lt;div class="infosSecondaires"&gt; &lt;div class="creator"&gt;&lt;a href="#"&gt;Object Creator&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt; 2010 &lt;span class="dash"&gt;|&lt;/span&gt; 5 min &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;todo:need to rename top wrapper (m-carousel-thumbnails) so that the card can be used in other context (maybe a size class…)TypesDiffrent types of media can be displayed as cards. Using .application or .interactif on the .vignette wrapper will change the CTA icon that appears on roll over. &lt;div class="vignetteGratuite vignette interactif"&gt; [...]&lt;/div&gt; Vignette gratuite avec un texte de titre vraiment beaucoup trop long pour tester qu'il est bien tronqué campus Claude Cloutier 2010 | 5 min Vignette interactive Claude Cloutier 2010 | 5 min Vignette application Claude Cloutier 2010 | 5 min Film for saletodo fix this, image need to stretch Thubnail payant Pierre-Luc Granjon, Antoine Lanciaux 2011 | 26 min Modifiers &lt;div class="vignetteGratuite vignette not-available"&gt; [...]&lt;/div&gt; class result .not-available Card is greyed out, overlay still visible .no-play CTA icon overlay disabled .no-click Link deactivated, no “click” cursor These class can be combine to create the desired effect.Horizontal Formats&lt;div class="m-carousel-thumbnails thumbnail-horizontal"&gt; &lt;div class="vignette"&gt; [...] &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; En dernier recours Jacques Godbout 1987 | 71 min Playlist Exemple vignette playlist curateurThe Pan American and Parapan American Games are the world’s third largest international multi-sport event and one of the most important summer sport competitions in the Americas. They are held every four years for athletes residing in the... La tranchéeThe Pan American and Parapan American Games are the world’s third largest international multi-sport event and one of the most important summer sport competitions in the Americas. They are held every four years for athletes residing in the... La tranchée 1 film User’s medias / Complex vignettes&lt;div class="vignetteLesson vignette"&gt; &lt;!-- Main Visual --&gt; &lt;a href="#" class="containerScreenshot"&gt; &lt;img src="main_visual.jpg" class="img-responsive" alt="object_title"&gt; &lt;/a&gt; &lt;div class="bottomThumbnail"&gt; &lt;!-- Object Title --&gt; &lt;a href="#" class="titre"&gt;Vignette - variante&lt;/a&gt; &lt;!-- Object Status --&gt; &lt;span class="filmRestriction"&gt; &lt;i class="icon-eye"&gt;&lt;/i&gt; public &lt;/span&gt; &lt;!-- Object Details --&gt; &lt;div class="infosSecondaires titreDotDotDot" style="overflow-wrap: break-word;"&gt; &lt;span class="creator"&gt;&lt;a href="#"&gt;Bill Gastro&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt; 2017 &lt;/div&gt; &lt;!-- Tools --&gt; &lt;div class="dropdown more-menu bottomRight"&gt; &lt;a data-target="#" class="tool" data-original-title="more options" data-placement="left" data-toggle="dropdown" role="button"&gt;&lt;i class="icon-more-menu-vert"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/a&gt; &lt;ul class="dropdown-menu"&gt; &lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="#" class="btn btn-link" data-original-title="edit"&gt;&lt;i class="icon-edit-o"&gt;&lt;/i&gt; edit&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;&lt;form action="#" method="post"&gt; &lt;button type="submit" class="btn btn-link disable" data-original-title="share lesson" id="submit" name="share"&gt;&lt;i class="icon-share-lesson"&gt;&lt;/i&gt; Share&lt;/button&gt; &lt;/form&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;&lt;form action="#" method="post"&gt;&lt;button type="submit" class="btn btn-link disable" id="submit" name="duplicate"&gt;&lt;i class="icon-duplicate-lesson"&gt;&lt;/i&gt; duplicate&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/form&gt;&lt;/li&gt; 5.title: Colour Switcher
5.content: Colour SwitcherWIP Matching the colours of an image to the NFB palette RequirementsMatching the colours of an image to the NFB paletteOne of the characteristic of the Balmoral Style is having interface element that match the colour of images. For example, the “Eyecon” in the background of the NFB.ca homepage always match the (dominant) colour of the main feature image.How it works: We analyse the color of an image to extract the dominant colour then this colour is match to the closest colour from the NFB Palette.Here is how to change the colour of a css property so that it matches the colour of any image.First, add the .is-switch-color class and add the following parameters: property values description data-switchColorIdImg   The id of the image we want to use to define the colour data-switchColorCssProperty color, background-color The css property to change data-switchColorType brandColor, dominantColor The colour selection mode data-switchColorTextElement HEX Colour optional Force a specific colour for overlay texts &lt;img src="myImage.jpg" id="myImageID"&gt;&lt;button type="button" class="btn is-switch-color " data-switchcoloridimg="myImageID" data-switchcolorcssproperty="background-color" data-switchcolortype="brandColor"&gt;Matching color button!&lt;/button&gt;Matching NFB colourRequirementsThis functionality needs the following scripts: jquery-2.1.1.min.js preloadjs-0.6.1.min.js color-thief.min.js tinycolor.js m-switch-color.js

7.title: Components
7.content: ComponentsStyles for most of the NFB Platforms components are build on top of Bootstrap 3.4

8.title: Content Principles
8.content: Content Principles Audience 3 overarching content statementsOverview of how the NFB writes onlineAudience3 overarching content statements

10.title: Forms
10.content: FormsWIPForms are following the markup defined in Bootstrap v3.4 Email address Password Example block-level help text here. option 1 option 2 option 3 option 4 option 5 Check me out Submit&lt;form&gt; &lt;div class="form-group"&gt; &lt;label for="exampleInputEmail1"&gt;Email address&lt;/label&gt; &lt;input type="email" class="form-control" id="exampleInputEmail1" placeholder="Email"&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="form-group"&gt; &lt;label for="exampleInputPassword1"&gt;Password&lt;/label&gt; &lt;input type="password" class="form-control" id="exampleInputPassword1" placeholder="Password"&gt; &lt;small class="help-block"&gt;Example block-level help text here.&lt;/small&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="checkbox"&gt; &lt;label&gt; &lt;input type="checkbox"&gt; Check me out &lt;/label&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;button type="submit" class="btn btn-default"&gt;Submit&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/form&gt;

11.title: Heros
11.content: HerosWIPFull width banner with floating eyecon ovelay Booyakacha Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur. boom&lt;div class="hero hero--eyecon hero--eyecon-blue"&gt; &lt;div class="hero__content"&gt; &lt;h1 class="hero__title"&gt; &lt;/h1&gt; &lt;h2 class="hero__tagline"&gt; &lt;/h2&gt; &lt;a href="#" class="btn btn-bleu hero__cta"&gt; &lt;/a&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;img class="hero__visual" src=""/&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="relative"&gt; &lt;section id="titleEyeCon" class="l-fullblock-followMenu"&gt; &lt;div id="titleEyeConBloc"&gt;&lt;!-- copydeck --&gt; &lt;h1 class="brand-dash"&gt; Aabiziingwashi&lt;br&gt;(WideAwake): &lt;br&gt;NFB&amp;nbsp;Indigenous &lt;br&gt;Cinema on Tour &lt;/h1&gt; &lt;p class="playMe2"&gt;&lt;a href="#legacy-trailer" data-modal="true" class="btn-transparent no-background btn"&gt;&lt;i class="icon-play icon"&gt;&lt;/i&gt; Watch trailer&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/section&gt; &lt;section class="m-image-banner push noPaddingBottom"&gt; &lt;div class="l-boxRatio"&gt; &lt;!-- main visual --&gt; &lt;img src="https://media1.nfb.ca/medias/nfb_tube/uploaded_images/2017/wa-main-img.jpg" id="bgBanner" alt="AABIZIINGWASHI"&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/section&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

app-icon-collapse-up app-icon-pause-circle Legacy IconsPhasing out add-circle cash cc-en cc-fr cd collapse-down collapse-up credit-card dto-disk dv help-circle helpcenter interactif interactif-hand interactive-app roundedArrow share share2 switch top vod vod-tilt warning Icon fontWe use Icomoon.io to generate a font from svg.How to add an icon to the NFB set: Download the selection.json source file and upload it in the ico moon app to access our icons. Add your new icon. Download the files generate by icomoon.fr :: Le site utilise le service Icomoon pour générer une font à partir de svg.Voici les 5 étapes pour ajouter une fonte à icomoon : Téléchargez le fichier source selection.json et uploader le dans l’app d’ico moon afin d’avoir accès à nos icônes. Ajoutez votre nouvel icône. Téléchargez le dossier générer par icomoonStatus BadgeTo add a color indicator over an icon, add the .status-badge class to the icon. By default, the indicators are green, but the indicators can also follow the logic of the alert messages if we add the classes .warning, .success and .dangerfr :: Pour ajouter un indicateur de couleur par dessus une îcone, ajouter la classe .status-badge à l’icone. Par défaut les indicateurs sont vert, mais les indicateurs peuvent aussi suivre la logique des messages d’alertes si on y ajoute les classes .warning, .success et .danger &lt;i class="icon-share-lesson status-badge"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;i class="icon-info-o status-badge danger"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;i class="icon-lesson status-badge warning"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;

14.content: STYLE GUIDEBrand PlatformTo benefit from the greatest impact possible and create harmony among all of the organization’s internal and external communications, general brand platform usage standards have been developed. These standards are presented in this document, along with examples of applications to serve as inspiration for future items to be produced, which should always respect the spirit of the platform and convey a clear message.NFB Brand PlatformStyle Guide on NFB.caOriginal NFB Style Guide (authorization required)

15.title: Layout
15.content: Layout Grid Breakpoint Layout X-small Small Medium X-large Content area Page wide sectionGridThe site uses a mobile-first, 12 columns responsive grid based on Bootstrap (3.4, It also uses Bootstrap’s system of medias queries. A media query ( @screen-xl-min ) and associated classes (.col-xl-) have been added for large resolutions. See the bootstrap documentation for more information on using this grid.fr :: Le site utilise la grille responsive mobile-first en 12 colonnes de bootstrap. Ainsi que son système de medias queries. Un media query (@screen-xl-min) ainsi que les classes associées (.col-xl-) ont été ajoutés pour les grandes résolutions. Consultez la documentation de bootstrap pour plus d’informations sur l’utilisation de la grille.Breakpoint break point media query description Default   Mobile first! Phone to small tablets 768px @media (min-width: @screen-sm-min) {} For small tablets or tablets in portrait format. 990px @media (min-width: @screen-md-min) {} For small computers or tablets in landscape format. 1200px @media (min-width: @screen-lg-min) {} Regular computers. 1440px @media (min-width: @screen-xl-min) {} Large screen computers and TVs tv. LayoutExample of how the layout adjust to different screen sizes:X-smallX-Small - Menu ouvertX-Small - Menu ferméSmallSmall - Menu ouvertSmall - Menu ferméMediumMedium - Menu ouvertMedium - Menu ferméX-largeX-Large - Menu ouvertX-Large - Menu ferméContent areaIt is possible to make a content area that takes 90% .l-largeur90p or 80% .l-largeur80p of the available area when the menu is open. For example, the content of the movie page is built to take up 80% of the available space while the list pages take 90%.fr :: Il est possible de faire une zone de contenu qui prend 90% ou 80% de la zone disponible quand le menu est ouvert. Par exemple, le contenu de la page de film est construit pour prendre 80% de l’espace disponible alors que les pages de liste prennent 90%.90% wide block Lorem ipsum { % block main_container_content % } &lt;div class="l-largeur90p m-caroussel-thumbnails"&gt; Lorem ipsum &lt;/div&gt;{ % endblock % }80% wide block Lorem ipsum { % block main_container_content % } &lt;div class="l-largeur80p"&gt; Lorem ipsum &lt;/div&gt;{ % endblock % }Page wide sectionPage section that exceeds the content areaTo make elements that come out of the content area (eg the module m-featured whose image is hidden by the menu when it is open) you have to use the template element &lt;%block name="l_big_container"&gt; instead of &lt;%block name="main_container_content"&gt; and add 2 &lt;div&gt; which will move the contents when the side menu opens and closes.If you want to make blocks of color that take the width of the window, you must add one of these classes on the &lt;div&gt; .l-bigContainer:fr :: Page avec éléments qui dépasse de la zone de contenuPour faire une page ou il y a des éléments qui sorte de la zone de contenu (exemple le module “m-featured” dont l’image est masquée par le menu quand il est ouvert) il faut utiliser l’élément de templating &lt;%block name="l_big_container"&gt; au lieu de &lt;%block name="main_container_content"&gt; et ajouter 2 &lt;div&gt; qui permettront de déplacer le contenu lorsque le menu ouvre et ferme.Si on veut faire des blocs de couleur qui prennent la largeur de la fenêtre, il faut ajouter une de ces classes sur le &lt;div&gt; .l-bigContainer : colour class blanc .l-blocBlanc gris pâle .l-blocGrisPale gris fonçé .l-blocGrisFonce jaune (utilisé pour les erreurs 404 et 500) .l-blocJaune Example: Yellow block @ 80% Lorem ipsum { % block l_big_container % } &lt;div class="l-blocJaune l-bigContainer"&gt; &lt;div class="l-contentContainer"&gt; &lt;div class="l-largeur80p m-caroussel-thumbnails"&gt; Lorem ipsum &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;{ % endblock % }

16.title: Lists
16.content: Listing Standard object list Secondary list : sans-serif TaglistStandard object listUsed when the listing is the mains focus on a page Ianzelo, Tony Ibanez, Manuel Idlout, Sarah Ille, Monika &lt;div class="m-listing"&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="#"&gt;...&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="#"&gt;...&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt; Secondary list : sans-serifUse when the list is secondary (aside) to separate it visually when it is next to a primary sans serif text block Ianzelo, Tony Ibanez, Manuel Idlout, Sarah Ille, Monika &lt;div class="m-listing listing--sans-serif"&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="#"&gt;...&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="#"&gt;...&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt; TaglistTo be used on ul (and special dl ) Ianzelo, Tony Ibanez, Manuel Idlout, Sarah Ille, Monika &lt;ul class="m-taglist"&gt; &lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="#"&gt;...&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="#"&gt;...&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;dl class="m-taglist"&gt; &lt;dt&gt;...&lt;/dt&gt; &lt;dd&gt;...&lt;/dd&gt; &lt;dd&gt;...&lt;/dd&gt; &lt;dd&gt;...&lt;/dd&gt; &lt;/dl&gt;

17.title: Alerts & Messages
17.content: Alerts &amp; Messages Colours and status levels Message with choicesMessage banners are displayed at the top of a page. Just insert the following code in a &lt;% block name = "ribbon"&gt; &lt;/% block&gt; of the template. The x button uses the html element hiding utility.fr :: Les bandeaux d’alerte s’affiche dans le haut d’une page. Il suffit d’insérer le code suivant dans la zone éditable de template &lt;%block name="ribbon"&gt;&lt;/%block&gt;. Le bouton x utilise l’utilitaire de masquage d’élément html.&lt;div class="l-bigContainer m-ribbon" id="alerte"&gt; &lt;div class="l-contentContainer"&gt; &lt;div class="l-largeur80p maxWidth"&gt; &lt;p class="message"&gt; This is something you should know. &lt;/p&gt; &lt;a href="" class="x-icon-link" data-hideElement="#alerte"&gt;X&lt;/a&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; Great news for you! Colours and status levelsThe default color of the message ribbon is blue (info). Colour of the ribbon can be change to fit common types of messages: .warning, .success and .danger&lt;div class="l-bigContainer m-ribbon warning" id="alerte"&gt; &lt;div class="l-contentContainer"&gt; &lt;div class="l-largeur80p maxWidth"&gt; &lt;p class="message"&gt; You better watch out... &lt;/p&gt; &lt;a href="" class="x-icon-link" data-hideElement="#alerte"&gt;X&lt;/a&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; You better watch out... This is bad... This is great! Message with choicesTo add buttons to a message ribbon, you need to add the .withChoice class to the top container.&lt;div class="l-bigContainer m-ribbon withChoice"&gt; &lt;div class="l-contentContainer"&gt; &lt;div class="l-largeur80p"&gt; &lt;p class="message"&gt; This is a message for you. &lt;br&gt; &lt;strong&gt;Do you want to.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class="btContainer"&gt; &lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary plein"&gt;yes&lt;/button&gt; &lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-danger" data-hideelement="#ribbonConfirmAccount"&gt;no&lt;/button&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; This is the 3rd item you've removed from [Curator Name] Do you want to stop Following [him/her]. Keep following Stop following

18.title: Modals and popups
18.content: Modals and PopupsWIP Modals Tooltips Pop overModals&lt;div id="loginModal" class="m-modal"&gt; &lt;div class="m-popup"&gt; &lt;header&gt; &lt;h4&gt;Pop-up&lt;/h4&gt; &lt;a href="" class="x-icon-link" data-closeModal="true"&gt; (x) &lt;/a&gt; &lt;/header&gt; &lt;div class="embed-player-container"&gt; &lt;iframe src="/film/dehors_novembre/embed/player/" width="560" height="315" frameborder="0"&gt;&lt;/iframe&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Ouvrir le pop-up Pop-up TooltipsbrokenPlease see working versions on nfb.ca (authorization requierd)fr ::Il faut ajouter la classe is-greyTooltip sur le lien et entrer le texte qui sera afficher dans la bulle dans l’attribut data-original-title.Il s’agit des tooltip bootstrap stylisé.Tooltip gris&lt;a href="javascript:void(0);" class="is-greyTooltip" data-original-title='Infos supplémentaires'&gt;Tooltip gris&lt;/a&gt;Pop overbrokenPlease see working versions on nfb.ca (authorization requierd)fr :: Il s’agit des popOver de bootstrap stylisé. Le container et le trigger peuvent être passé via les attributs data-container et data-trigger.?&lt;span class="is-popoverLink helpInfos" data-placement="auto" data-trigger="popover" title="Titre" data-container="&lt;small&gt;Contenu&lt;/small&gt;"&gt;?&lt;/span&gt;

22.title: Style definition
22.content: Online platforms style definition Colour themes Eyecons Fonts DashThe NFB ‘Balmoral’ style is defined by the following objects : A palette of 8 colours The NFB eyecons Short horizontal lines (dash) Ciutadella &amp; Suisse fontColour themesThe 8 colours of the NFB Palette can be used to ‘theme’ the main content of a site. Themes are monochromatic. Only one colour should be used on a page main content.The objects that can be coloured are : Eyecons Dashes Buttons &amp; links Articles lead Play buttonNever use the NFB colours on : NFB logo body textThe colour theme is site or page specific. A colour theme can be chosen for an entire site or be set dynamically depending on pages content.Dynamic themes are selected based on the dominant image on a page.The colours should not be used to identify the sections of a website. Colour themes should not be meaningful in terms of a site’s architecture.EyeconsEyecons must always be placed flush to the edge of a page or of an interface element that has clear borders.There can be multiple eyecons on a page.Eyecons should not be burned into images.Download Eyecons (.ai)FontsWe use a combination of serif and sans-serif font.Ciutadella is the sans-serif font used on interface components (navigation, buttons and cards) and on heading in text block.The Suisse font (serif) is used on text blocks.Ciutadella Bold All Caps is used to identify the different section of a page. Example, it’s used on the titles of components like carousel. It can be used in very large type as a main header on the top of a page.see TypographyDashThe dash can be used as a divider to mark the beginning or the end of a block.It can also be combine with text (Ciutadella bold) to recreate the signature titles of NFB advertising. In this context, the width of the dash should match the size of the font (the width of a character’s stroke)

23.title: Reference Guide
23.content: Reference Guide NFB auth NFB.caDetailed content guidance with examplesNFB auth NFB Account Compte ONF User account that allow users to connect on various NFB platforms NFB.ca Channel Chaîne A dynamic list of films grouped together under a common theme. In a channel the films can change over time. Playlist Selection A more ‘personalized’ list of films group together under a common subject with possible contextualization. Playlist are static, the films they contain should not change over time.

26.title: Typography
26.content: Typography Fonts Font stack Sans-serif type: Serif type: Display type: Type scale Usage Text formatting Copy wrapper Headers size Table Color Text and TitlesFontsCiutadellaDefault sans-serif typefaceAÀÂBCDEÉÈÊËFGHIÎÏJKLMNOÔPQRSTUÛVWXYZ aàâbcdeéèêëfghiîïjklmnoôpqrstuûvwxyz 1234567890Ciutadella BoldDisplay typeAÀÂBCDEÉÈÊËFGHIÎÏJKLMNOÔPQRSTUÛVWXYZ aàâbcdeéèêëfghiîïjklmnoôpqrstuûvwxyz 1234567890Download: CiutadellaSuisseDefault serif type for body text/AÀÂBCDEÉÈÊËFGHIÎÏJKLMNOÔPQRSTUÛVWXYZaàâbcdeéèêëfghiîïjklmnoôpqrstuûvwxyz1234567890Download: SuisseFont stackWIPSans-serif type:@font-family-sans-serif"Ciutadella-Regular", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;Serif type:@font-family-serif "Suisse", Georgia, serif;Display type:@font-family-displayfont-family: "Ciutadella-Bold", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; Ciutadella is used for headings and on navigation, button and other interface labels Suisse is used for main body text, tables and forms.Type scaleThe base font is 16px except for the x-wide screen size or it is 19px. The spacing and size of the elements is based on the traditional rule of typographic rhythm.fr :: Le base font est de 16px sauf pour la taille d’écran x-large ou il est à 19px. L’espacement et la taille des éléments est basé sur la règle traditionnelle du rythme typographique.UsageCiutadella is the sans-serif font used on interface components (navigation, buttons and cards). It’s also used on heading in text block.The Suisse font (serif) is mostly used on text blocks. (it’s sometime used on numbers in older components like pagination).Ciutadella Bold + All Caps is used to identify the different section of a page. Example, it’s used on the titles of components like carousel. It can be used in very large type as a main header on the top of a page.Text formattingCopy wrapperAll styles related to text layout are protected by using the .copy class. Add the .copy class to a parent element to eliminate conflicts with styles that govern the look and feel of the interface.fr :: Tous les styles relatif a la mise en page de texte sont securises grace a l utilisation de la classe .copy. Ajouter la classe .copy sur un élément parent afin d eliminer les conflicts avec les styles qui regisse le look and feel de l interface. Phasellus a ligula nec odio varius volutpat. Paragraphe lInteger semper, dolor non mattis ornare, dui tortor pulvinar purus, id scelerisque nunc sem hendrerit leo. Aenean vel fringilla velit. Phasellus a ligula nec odio varius volutpat. Headers size Heading tag class size (reg. screen - large screen) Heading one &lt;h1&gt; .h1 3rem (48px - 57px) Heading two &lt;h2&gt; .h2 2rem (32px - 38px) Heading three &lt;h3&gt; .h3 1.75rem (28px - 33px) Heading four &lt;h4&gt; .h4 1.5rem (24px - 28px) Heading five &lt;h5&gt; .h5 1.33rem (21px - 25px) It is possible to keep the semantics of heading element (like &lt;h1&gt;) and to associate the style of another heading type (like a &lt;h4&gt;). This can be done in 2 ways: By applying the .h4 class to the &lt;h1&gt; &lt;h1 class="h4"&gt;. This way would be preferable if the style that one wants to give to the &lt;h1&gt; is exactly the style of &lt;h4&gt; (same spacing, font, color, size …). By adding the class .h4 to our element in the css/less file. This way is better if you want to start from the style of h4 and then customize it even more (change the color, make it, etc.)fr :: Il est possible de garder la sémantique d’un élément de titre (ex: un h1) et de lui associer le style d’un autre élément (ex: un h4). Ceci peut être fait de 2 façons : En appliquant la classe .h4 au &lt;h1&gt; dans le code html &lt;h1 class="h4"&gt;. Cette façon serait préférable si le style que l’on veut donner au &lt;h1&gt; est exactement le style du&lt;h4&gt; (même espacement, font, couleur, taille…) En ajoutant la classe .h4 à notre élément dans le css. Cette façon est préférable si on veut partir du style du h4 et ensuite le personnaliser encore plus (changer la couleur, la font, etc.)TableAdd the class .table to the &lt;table&gt; tag This is an example table, and this is its caption to describe the contents. Table heading Table heading Table heading Table heading Table cell Table cell Table cell Table cell Table cell Table cell Table cell Table cell Table cell Table cell Table cell Table cell Color Text and TitlesUse colored text on the beginning of an article. Color available: .rose, .bleu, .orange, .rouge, .violet, .vert &amp; .turquoise.The following colors are based on official colors but have been adjusted to ensure optimal readability (WCAG 2.0 accessibility AAA).NFB brand colors adjusted for text Colour hex color hex red #DB3934 orange #FF5430 yellow #AC8D00 green #8B9700 turquoise #00A197 blue #0085CA violet #87319A pink #F64166 fr :: Utilisation de texte de couleur sur l’amorce d’un article. Couleur disponibles : .rose, .bleu, .orange, .rouge, .violet, .vert &amp; .turquoise.Les couleurs suivantes sont basees sur les couleurs officielles mais ont ete ajustees pour assurer une lisibilite optimal (WCAG 2.0 accessibility AAA).Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. &lt;p class="m-article-lead rose"&gt;[...]&lt;/p&gt;Note: To use these colors on text, the character size must be at least 24px. 2. The use of yellow is deprecated. The color tint required to conform to the standard is too far from the original yellow. Accessibility of adjusted NFB pallette Accessibility of real NFB pallette

27.title: Utilities
27.content: Utilities Collaps Scroll-To Show/HideCollapsBy adding the .collapseBlock class to an element, the next element will be hidden automatically and it will be displayed with a collapse animation when the element is clicked. If you want to collapse another element than the next, just add the id of the element to collapse in the data-block attribute of the element on which we click.fr ::En ajoutant la classe .collapseBlock à un élément, l’élément suivant sera masqué automatiquement et il s’affichera avec une animation de collapse au clic sur l’élément. Si on désire collapser un autre élément que le suivant, il suffit d’ajouter le id de l’élément à collapser dans l’attribut data-block de l’élément sur lequel on clique. En savoir plusLorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris.&lt;a class="collapseBlock" &gt;&lt;i class="icon-arrowhead"&gt;&lt;/i&gt; En savoir plus&lt;/a&gt;&lt;div class="relatedToContent"&gt; &lt;p&gt;Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Scroll-TobrokenPlease see working versions on nfb.ca (authorization requierd)fr :: Il faut ajouter l’attribut data-scrollToAnchor="true" au lien et mettre l’ancre dans l’attribut href du lien.Retour au haut de la page&lt;a href="#l-generalContainer" data-scrollToAnchor="true" &gt;Retour au haut de la page&lt;/a&gt;Show/HidebrokenPlease see working versions on nfb.ca (authorization requierd)fr :: Masquer ou afficher un élément au clic (via l’ID de l’élément à afficher ou à masquer)Ajouter le sélecteur de l’élément que vous voulez afficher dans l’attribut data-showElement et le sélecteur de l’élément que vous voulez masquer dans l’attribut data-hideElement. Il est possible de mettre uniquement 1 des 2 attributs si on veut seulement masquer ou afficher quelquechose.&lt;a href="" id="showAllo" data-showElement="#allo" data-hideElement="#showAllo"&gt;Cliquer pour masquer l'élément courant et afficher 'allo'&lt;/a&gt;&lt;div id="allo" class="hidden"&gt;Allo&lt;/div&gt;fr :: Vous pouvez masquer l’élément sur lequel on clique en mettant +this dans l’attribut data-hideElement.&lt;div id="divParent"&gt; &lt;a href="" class="showAllo" data-showElement="#divParent .allo" data-hideElement="+this" &gt;Cliquer pour masquer l'élément courant et afficher 'allo'&lt;/a&gt; &lt;div class="hidden allo"&gt;Allo&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

28.title: Voice & Tone
28.content: Voice &amp; ToneWhat we say and how we say itexample from 2012: Intelligent, but not snobbish Cool, but not trendy Accessible, but not for dummiesfr Intelligent, sans être snob Cool, sans être tendance Accessible, sans être “pour les nuls”
